title: Blank view when open yearn.finance in Status WebView
body: # Bug Report ## Problem The https://yearn.finance shown blank view when open in Android/iOS browser. #### Expected behavior https://yearn.finance content is shown in Webview #### Actual behavior Blank view: ### Reproduction [comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.) - Open Status and create new account - Open Browser -> enter `yearn.finance` in URL input and hit GO ### Additional Information - Status version: develop 1.8/release 1.7.2 - Operating System: Android and iOS #### Logs ``` 10-07 19:38:23.256 23999 24104 D ReactNativeJS: DEBUG [status-im.navigation:10] -
